attributes.action: Have children in primary schools repeat this academic year.
attributes.additional_details:
Have children in primary schools repeat this academic year and move forward without skipping a year! 
Primary school children are at a massive disadvantage, due to the importance of their young development process. These academic years are vital for their future success. They have lost out in nearly a full academic year and most children will find it impossible to catch up and perform at a level expected by the government.
attributes.background:
Have children in primary schools repeat this academic year and move forward without skipping a year! 
Primary school children are at a massive disadvantage, due to the importance of their young brains development process. These academic years are vital for their future success.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

All pupils to repeat this current academic year: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566160
